ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Maybe he just leveled up to the point where he realized that while ideas like the above look good in writing, in actual practice no one does this. For any
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Feb 27/01, "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...> wrote:
> *sigh* Did Kenross get sold on ebay? To say that the needed change to the
> lvl 19 song (adding see invis) made the lvl 24 song pointless is about the
> stupidest thing I have read on this or any list. Next time you need to see
> invis with a pet caster around see how much they enjoy recasting their pet
> when you pulse clouding to see invis. Or maybe when you are fighting invis
> mobs in PoA or another zone and have to use your flute so your party can see
> the invis mob you are fighting.

Maybe he just leveled up to the point where he realized that while ideas
like the above look good in writing, in actual practice no one does
this. For any caster other than a hybrid, the mana to cast see invis at
L50 comes back faster than you can cast the spell.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
